Replies.Reply: Oh my god! Where are you?
No, no, no. Don't go. What are you talking about?
Martha! Don't hang up. Please! Do not hang up.
Do you want me to come get you?
What do you mean? Tell me where you are and I'll come right now.
I want to see you Martha. Please.
You were pretty upset on the phone.
And you were here the whole time?
You've been back in New York for over a year and you haven't called me?
Well, I'm glad you're here now.
Ted should be up from the city soon.
Get some sleep, you'll be as good as new tomorrow.
She had some boyfriend, they were living in the Catskills.
Martha? Why are you on the floor?
It's okay, you were in a deep sleep. Come have some breakfast.
How do you like the house?
Yeah. Do you still like to swim?
We do. This is for weekends and holidays.
Ted's finishing a new building down town and when it's done we're taking one of the new apartments. You want to see pictures?
This is the view, the interiors are obviously not finished. It's nice right?
We were supposed to move in the spring but construction halted, so, it'll just be a little while longer.
Okay, sorry, no more work talk.
It's okay, I can fix you something later.
You mean where I picked you up?
Would you put some clothes on, you can't swim naked.
You just can't. There are kids around and people come by.
So you can't. We don't, just don't. I have a bathing suit you can borrow.
I've been trying to wake you. You should get up or you won't sleep through the night.
Okay. I'm sorry I got frustrated with you before.
She's in a really deep sleep. I can't wake her.
She's had a bad breakup. I want to give her a couple days to get situated, you know?
A pain in my ass, yes.
Good morning. How are you feeling today?
There's this great juice shop in town, I got us a couple of juices.
This one is Kale with ginseng. It gives me energy, so I thought it might help you.
I got pineapple orange too if that's better.
I also got a box of these protein bars just in case you want to snack.
We like to entertain. Our friends come up for weekends and sometimes we have parties. It's just good to have space.
Of course no one else lives here.
Earlier this year, in the spring.
I tried to get in touch with you, apparently you got rid of your cell phone?
You never got a new one?
No, about forty people. Mostly his family.
Well I'm sure she'd love to know you're okay.
Relax, I don't have any pictures of you.
Don't shake it, that's a myth.
Your clothes are disgusting Martha, just try it.
It just feels good to put on something nice and comfortable.
It looks good you little shit.
You're making fun of me and I think it looks really good.
It just needs a little salt. What are you laughing about I cooked for you your whole life.
Jesus, you can't just come in like that.
Why would you think it was okay to come in like that?
You can't come into our room when we're having sex, that's not normal! It's private.
Don't apologize, I just want you to understand why it's not okay.
I'm sorry you slept out here. Thanks for being patient.
I just want to make sure she's okay.
That has nothing to do with Martha.
I'm her only family. She needs to be able to depend on me right now.
No. Maybe it's the pine cones.
Where did you pick up gardening?
Was he ever physical with you?
You had a bruised ear, and when you called me you were hysterical.
I wish you felt more comfortable talking to me.
Can you go get me a large jug of water.
Will you get it or not?
The one you almost ran into? No.
No. Jesus. The guy was checking you out Martha! Relax.
If you don't want guys to drool all over you, then wear more clothes-
I'll do these if you want to go to bed.
I just made some potato salad. Ted's cooking the fish.
Do you blame me for anything?
I'm just trying to figure out why we stopped talking.
Sometimes I wonder if, maybe I could have taken better care of you.
I know you did. I think I could have done more though.
Be honest with me, you never think about it?
No, Martha, I think the world of you, I'm just wondering if I should have come back and kept you in school and helped you go to college, you had so much potential.
Teacher and a leader? What are you talking about? I always encouraged you to do more, but you shut me out.
He's just saying we should start talking about what you're interested in. Maybe we can help you get some ideas together.
You can not be serious right now.
One minute you're going after Martha at the dinner table, then you're curling up together on the couch?
You really do think I'm stupid don't you?
You can lose your temper at will but when I get pissed off, I'm being crazy or ridiculous! I couldn't possibly be mad for a reason.
Fuck you. I just want you to think about how walking in on that might make me feel.
Maybe you should mind your own business.
I can't deal with talking to anyone right now.
What the fuck is wrong with you?
Martha please try to breath. I don't know what you're talking about.
It's too hot, let it cool for a minute.
Yes, you slept through the night.
Are you going to drink the tea?
Why don't you go sit down, I'll finish up.
I don't want to talk about it anymore.
About what, what are you so confused about?
You thought he was someone else? What is wrong with you?
I'm not doing this anymore, I'm not doing this anymore. I beat myself up over you for years and I'm sick of it, I'm sick of chasing you down and worrying about you.
We're going to get you proper help.
I don't know how to help you anymore.
We're trying to start a family and I don't trust you to be here.
Do you have any money left?
We'll make sure everything is taken care of.
I think we both said some things last night that we didn't mean.
We scheduled an appointment for you tomorrow morning.
We're heading back to the city in about an hour. You'll be ready to go?
Fucking idiot. What was he doing?
I'm not sure. Upstate I think.
I don't know. I should go back.
I have to go, I can't stay gone.
It's okay, you don't have to-
I just wanted to come into town.
I don't know. Maybe a year, maybe more or less.
I'm pretty tired, is it okay if I just go to bed?
It's nice. I didn't know there was a lake.
You don't live in the city anymore?
Great. You've got a really nice place here.
She's been great, everyone's been great.
I will. I'm just going to sleep a little more first okay?
Where do they go at night?
I shouldn't. I'm not going to drink for awhile, I think it's a good idea for me.
When do you think that'll happen?
Why is the house so big?
So no one else lives here?
I got used to not having it.
Did she smoke like chimney and complain about everything.
You never had to live with her.
She lived with me after mom died.
Is it true married people don't fuck?
Whatever makes you happy mama bear.
You microwaved chicken nuggets and fish sticks.
I can't remember anything, I just woke up on the floor and felt this pain -
I thought I'd help out more.
I don't know, it's normal I guess. She hasn't changed much.
She wouldn't know what to do with it.
I didn't think Lucy would worry about me.
It's been hard to sleep alone.
I don't know. It's a big bed, you guys were on the other side.
Because it's privte and it's not normal.
Do you ever hear things hitting the roof at night?
We had a garden where I lived?
He was looking at me like he knew me.
Did you say something to him?
I don't know, you tell me.
He was staring at me like he knew me, did you talk to him about me?
Nothing you don't want to. Drink this, it will help you relax.
It's herbal. It's the start of your cleansing.
We've all done it so you know there's nothing to worry about.
I know it seems a bit silly, but it's a part of it.
You look amazing. It's your special night with him, enjoy it, you'll be great.
I thought we were going to cook.
Do you ever have this thing where you can't tell if something's a memory or if it's something you've dreamed?
I know you don't think much of me but I knew what I was doing then and I still do.
I don't need your guidance, I never did. I'm a teacher and a leader, you just never let me be that but now I know I am, I know who I am.
Just because we're sisters doesn't mean we need to talk about everything that comes into your head.
There are other ways to live.
I don't know. People don't need careers, people should just exist.
You can do that if you want to.
It's not your fault but you learned that success is measured by money and possessions. It's just not the right way to live.
You don't know anything about it.
Especially if you're trying to have a kid.
I thought you weren't supposed to drink Mike.
You think you're so fucking smart.
He's a fucking liar. We all need to leave.
We have to leave. We all have to leave. I know him.
You don't want to live with this Lucy.
Don't touch me, you're not listening to me!
Thanks mom. I'm sorry I ruined the party.
How long do you think we'll be down here?
What do you think it was?
Do you still think about leaving?
No. I just wanted to see about you.
It's Marlene Lewis. What's your last name Jane.
Is this from the past or is this now?
I don't remember waking up this morning.
I can't stop feeling terrible for that poor man.
I thought he was someone else.
Are you going to send me away?
Please, I can't be alone, please.
You're going to be a terrible mother.
No need for that, we are leaving.
There's nothing to do Marcy, you need to get inside. Max is strong, he'll be fine.
Hey. How are you? Sure, yeah, let's do it, I'll be around there on Friday. No, that was my cousin Marlene, yeah, I'll see you in a bit then. Great, I'm glad you called.
I told you she was fine. You spend all that time worrying.
Great to finally meet you. You sleep alright?
Do you think she's excited to have you back?
Yep, just a little while longer.
I'm going for a dip. Anyone want to join?
She seems a bit off, no?
Has she always been like this?
It's good, it's just, a bit dry.
Alright. I'm going to take the boat out, do you want to come?
She had to run to the city.
I'll teach you how to drive the boat, come on.
How have things been with you and Lucy?
Is it strange to spend time together?
We're trying to have a baby.
No. She's good. She's relieved to have you back. You had her worried.
You disappeared. You haven't called in two years!
It's good to let people know where you are Martha. People worry.
I don't have much choice do I?
I get two weeks a year to come out here and try to relax before I have to go back to work!
I am under so much pressure right now-
I have a month to get this building up and running or the bank takes it.
My point is, I don't need the extra stress.
As complicated as it might be, we can't just keep ignoring the fact that her behavior is fucking insane.
So what are your plans Martha?
Are you thinking about what you can do for work?
You're at an age where you need to start thinking about a career.
It's a part of adult life.
I have moments when I would love to move to France and just exist but it doesn't work that way.
And what do you think the right way to live is? Being a hysterical mess and causing your family pain. You're eating my food and sleeping under my roof so watch your mouth. You're rude.
Me neither. I was going to watch a movie.
It always helps me. It's better than lying in bed awake.
You want me to make some breakfast?
No one was curling up with anybody.
Jesus, I couldn't sleep, I was watching a movie, she came out and sat down and started watching with me. What am I supposed to do, tell her to leave?
Are you accusing me of something? Because if you are, I'd like you to say it out loud so you can hear how absurd it sounds.
You ask me to make more of an effort. I try to do that and you get upset. I can't win.
I'll start looking into places tomorrow.
I don't think she should stay with us anymore. We can't do anything for her when she's like this.
She kicked me down the stairs. Jesus Christ, what's it going to take, Lucy.
Yeah, we think you're fucking awesome.
You're so lucky, I'd give anything to have my first time again.
That's the cleansing. It's good. It means it's working if you can't remember things. You're cleansing yourself of the past and the toxins.
You need to share yourself, don't be so selfish.
So smile then, enjoy this amazing night.
Yeah. He's right. I don't know why I'm so weak.
It'll just be a few days. Just to be safe.
I know. It happens though, we're never really dead or alive, we just exist, so he's still existing, but it's in a parallel time. Just don't think about it, it's in the past.
It's as much yours as it is mine.
Don't apologize to me, it's your body.
Look after this girl properly Zoe, she deserves some real care for once in her life.
You look like a Marcy May.
How's everything going so far Marcy May?
I want you to feel at home.
People have abandoned you your whole life. I don't blame you for not trusting anyone.
If you ever want to have a meaningful relationship, you need to let your guard down.
It's not your fault, but it's there. If you feel safe here, and I think you do, let us in. We just want to help you.
If you're going to live here then really be apart of things.
Well she, she's just a picture.
Calm down, if you calm down no one will get hurt.
We're not stealing, we don't want anything.
We're just looking at the house. It's nice.
We didn't realize you were home. We wouldn't have come in otherwise.
I would but I can't be sure you won't call the police.
Safe? Why wouldn't anyone be safe. Unless you call the police, everything will be fine.

You know that death is the most beautiful part of life, right? Death is beautiful because everyone fears death. And fear is the greatest human emotion of all because it creates complete awareness. When you're scared it forces you to be completely aware of your surroundings and the moment you're in. It brings you to NOW and that makes you truly present. And when you are truly present, that's nirvana, that's pure love. So, death is pure love.
I felt like we had a connection.
That's not what you're showing me.
You're my favorite, I won't lose you.
I don't know, I never get invited.
You want to have a drink with me?
They won't be back for a few hours.
It's cool, I'm good at hiding it.
I don't know. It doesn't matter.
We switch off jobs each day so we all know how to do different things.
It's okay, you'll find your role. It takes time for people to find their role in a new family.
We sell blankets in town. We still need some money, but when the farm's up and running we'll be self sufficient and we'll never have to worry about it again.
Hopefully by the end of the summer but we'll see. It's hard to get machinery and live stock without cash.
I know you feel like something bad just happened Marcy May, but you have to trust me, that was not bad, it was truly good.
You're ready. Zoe can help but you'll be great.
Nothing till they're done. You know better.
What do I have to do?
Do I have to wear this robe?
I won't. You didn't take anything so just go, I just want my family to be safe.
Okay, I won't. You have my word, please just go.
Get the fuck out of my house.
